summary: Adrift in a lush, nocturnal urban landscape, Nick is a post-modern urban hero asserting his anarchistic agenda on the endless maze of virgin exterior walls that comprise downtown Seattle ... See full summary »
cast: Ruben Bansie|Pledgure Duoshun|Zachary S. Smalls|Robert D. Heath Jr.|Rich Clemets|Rich Carlton|Pepper Fajans|Daniel Parker|Luke Cook|Dan Stegner|Justin Lawrence|John Paulson|Megan Johnston|Don Connell|Angie Golds|Natascha Snellman
title: The Graffiti Artist
